channel.title: A fishing script for OSBot
channel.description:
All of the free fishing scripts for OSBot are incredibly shit so I made my own fishing script using the OSBot API, here are some of my proggies. The bot was set to "break" every 1-2 hours at 25-45 minute intervals. It's not ready for release yet but when it is I'll make another topic with the download :)
This is my first script so any constructive criticism is appreciated (from what you can see at least). The script will literally run well for ages, if you look at one of the proggy pictures it ran good by itself for 8 hours, although I stopped it shortly after to do a quest :P
I checked on it every few hours to check progress and to start conversations with others (less likely to get banned).
[B][U]Features[/U][/B]
[ul][*]Will evade whirlpools [*]Will look for your equipment after a fish spits them out [*]Interactive GUI [*]Support for powerfishing [*]Support for banking [*]Anti-ban mechanisms [*]Lots more I probably missed[/ul]
[B][U]Progress Snapshots[/U][/B]
[SPOILER="Proggies"][IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/proggy1_zps57953e64.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/proggy2_zpsb6fef189.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/proggy3_zps06e3b249.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/proggy4_zps604b2bd0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/proggy5_zps6d40c9da.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/proggy6_zps4e027b21.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/fishing_gui_zps1abbd9a0.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
